author: Staff Reporter
text:
Three persons, including a mother and her son, were killed in a road accident on the National Highway 48 near Puthukoil on Tuesday evening.

Saravanan (17), a resident of Koothandavakuppam, Kethandapatti post, had gone to Bethakallupalli to pick up his mother, Shanthi. Murugan (27), a mason from Koothandavakuppam, was engaged to build a toilet in the house.

Saravanan, along with his mother Shanthi and Murugan, left Bethakallupalli in a two-wheeler. On the NH 48, Saravanan took a turn near Puthukoil when a lorry plying from Krishnagiri towards Vaniyambadi rammed the motorbike. The accident occurred around 7.30 p.m.

The trio were thrown off the vehicle, and succumbed to grievous injuries.

Following this, relatives of Shanthi and villagers staged a road blockade on the spot. Police pacified the protesters and nabbed the lorry driver, who had fled the accident spot.
title: Three killed as lorry rams bike
